Type: Living
Price: 2499.00

SPECIAL ORDER ONLY! 

Embellished with classic buttoned tufting, the Bloomsburg sofa offers a modern twist on the traditional Chesterfield design that will instantly lift your living room interior. Draped in shimmering velvet in a vibrant hue, the Bloomsburg is both bold and beautiful. Matching armchair available here.
